inclusion.criterion: migraine with or without an aura who met the criteria of the International Headache Society
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is diagnosed with the migraine headache and is under treatment.

inclusion.criterion: with at least one prior episode of a similar headache
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The attacks come 2 times or more per week and each episode lasts around a day or a half.

exclusion.criterion: pre-medication within six hours of being enrolled in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: more than six prior headaches per month
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The attacks come 2 times or more per week and each episode lasts around a day or a half.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is diagnosed with the migraine headache and is under treatment.

notes: A 15 year old girl with a history of recurrent bilateral headache. The attacks are associated with nausea and photophobia.
